item.description: On Friday August 21, 2009, Tufts University's (Totally Unofficial) Faculty & Staff Social Group will gather for its first ever meeting at Orleans Bar & Restaurant on Holland Street in Davis Square to network, socialize, tip back a cocktail or two, eat some delicious appetizers, and watch the Red Sox-Yankees game. Please RSVP and pass this along to your friends and colleagues. Shoot me an email if you have any questions, and I will do my best to respond in a timely manner.
item.how_to_find_us: I will either be sitting on the couches or at a table to the left of the entrance.
item.name: Tufts Faculty & Staff Social Group Pub Night and Sox Game
